title.rendered: CareFirst, Inc. names Hemant Bakshi as VP, Treasury Operation & Financial Planning

content.rendered: We are pleased to announce that our client, CareFirst, Inc., the largest healthcare insurer in the Mid-Atlantic Region, serving 3.4 million members, hired Hemant Bakshi to be their next Vice President, Treasury Operation & Financial Planning.  Reporting to the CFO, Hemant Bakshi will be responsible for all organizational and strategic FP&A for the organization inclusive of acquisition analysis, cash management and business unit financial planning.  Hemant was previously the VP, Finance and Treasurer for ICF International, a $1.5B publicly traded consulting firm where, since 2018, he has been responsible for corporate finance, global treasury and risk management.  Previously, he was the Sr. Director, FP&A for FTI Consulting and held roles in FP&A and Treasury with IntelSat (PE-backed), Inova HealthSystem, MCI Worldcom and started his career in Tax with KPMG.  Hemant will be based in the company’s Baltimore, MD location.
